// import {isString} from "lodash";
import React from "react";
import {cx} from "emotion";
 
import PropTypes from "../utils/prop-types-extra";
 
import Icon from "./icon";
 
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
import getChildren from "../utils/children";
// import pickHtmlProps from "../utils/pick-html-props";
 
import getDividerStyle from "../styles/divider/divider.style";
import getDividerIconStyle from "../styles/divider/divider-icon.style";
 
 
export function Divider({inverted,hidden,vertical,icon,component,section,fitted,header,...otherProps}) {
 
  let className = "cm-divider";
  const children = getChildren(otherProps);
 
  const horizontal = (children.length || !!icon) && !vertical;
 
  const styleFlags = {
    inverted,
    hidden,
    vertical,
    horizontal,
    header,
    section,
    fitted,
    basic: !horizontal && !vertical,
  };
 
  if (icon) {
    children.unshift(
      <i aria-hidden="true" key="icon" className={cx("icon",getDividerIconStyle(styleFlags))}>
        <Icon icon={icon} style={{verticalAlign: ""}} />
      </i> 
    );
  }
 
  className = cx("cm-divider",getDividerStyle(styleFlags));
 
  const newProps = mergeProps({className},otherProps);
 
  // if (isString(component)) {
  //   newProps = pickHtmlProps(newProps);
  // }
 
  return React.createElement(component,newProps,children);
 
}
 
Divider.propTypes = {
  icon: PropTypes.icon,
  vertical: PropTypes.bool,
  component: PropTypes.component,
  inverted: PropTypes.bool, 
  hidden: PropTypes.bool,
  section: PropTypes.bool,
  fitted: PropTypes.bool,
  header: PropTypes.bool,
};
 
Divider.defaultProps = {
  component: "div",
};
 
export function SectionDivider(props) {
  return <Divider section {...props} />;
}
 
export function HeaderDivider(props) {
  return <Divider component="h4" header {...props} />;
}
 
export function FittedDivider(props) {
  return <Divider fitted {...props} />;
}
 
export function HiddenDivider(props) {
  return <Divider hidden {...props} />;
}
 
 
export function VerticalDivider(props) {
  return <Divider vertical {...props} />;
}
 
export function InvertedDivider(props) {
  return <Divider inverted {...props} />;
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Feb 04 2019 18:54:39 GMT+0000 (GMT)
